index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to housing; authorizing agreements for and acceptance of financial assistance from the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) for the 1990 Rental Rehabilitation Program; authorizing implementation of rental housing rehabilitation projects by the department, the Department of Housing and Human Services; making an appropriation from the Housing Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund therefor and establishing a repayment account in said fund; and authorizing the Mayor or his designee to enter into any necessary implementing agreements.
